text.div:
BC OncotypeDxDCISRiskScoreInterpretationCS CodeSystem

Intepretation of OncotypeDX DCIS (Ductal Carcinoma In Situ) Recurrence Score

name: OncotypeDxDCISRiskScoreInterpretationCS
title: BC OncotypeDxDCISRiskScoreInterpretationCS CodeSystem
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC)
description: Intepretation of OncotypeDX DCIS (Ductal Carcinoma In Situ) Recurrence Score

concept.definition: Recurrence Score lower than 38: The cancer has a low risk of recurrence. The benefit of chemotherapy is likely to be small and will not outweigh the risks of side effects.
concept.display: Recurrence Score lower than 38: The cancer has a low risk of recurrence. The benefit of chemotherapy is likely to be small and will not outweigh the risks of side effects.

concept.definition: Recurrence Score of 39 up to and including 54: The cancer has an intermediate risk of recurrence. It’s unclear whether the benefits of chemotherapy outweigh the risks of side effects.
concept.display: Recurrence Score of 39 up to and including 54: The cancer has an intermediate risk of recurrence. It’s unclear whether the benefits of chemotherapy outweigh the risks of side effects.

concept.definition: Recurrence Score greater than or equal to 55: The cancer has a high risk of recurrence, and the benefits of chemotherapy are likely to be greater than the risks of side effects.
concept.display: Recurrence Score greater than or equal to 55: The cancer has a high risk of recurrence, and the benefits of chemotherapy are likely to be greater than the risks of side effects.
